meanings.definition: A type of sandwich originating from New Orleans, typically made with a round loaf of bread filled with various meats, cheeses, and olive salad.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious muffuletta for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The muffuletta at the deli was packed with flavors.
meanings.sent3: The muffuletta sandwich was so big, it could feed a whole family!
meanings.sent4: The muffuletta's layers of ingredients were like a tasty tower.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the muffuletta made my mouth water instantly.

meanings.definition: The round loaf of bread used to make a muffuletta sandwich.
meanings.sent1: The bakery had fresh muffuletta ready for sale.
meanings.sent2: I bought a loaf of muffuletta bread for the party.
meanings.sent3: The muffuletta bread was so round, it looked like a giant donut!
meanings.sent4: The muffuletta bread's crust was as crunchy as autumn leaves.
meanings.sent5: The texture of the muffuletta bread was soft and chewy.
